name: Fathom Santa Rosa Mask and Dry Snorkel - Women's
categories: Santa Rosa Mask and Dry Snorkel
description: Scan the reefs for seahorses and the coastline for manta rays with a performance-oriented mask and snorkel combo. Designed to fit women's smaller faces, the low-volume mask eases equalization and the silicone skirt creates a comfortable, reliable seal. The dry snorkel has a silicone mouthpiece and a purge valve to clear any water that does find its way in. Optical-quality tempered glass lenses let in superior brightness and colour, so you can take in the full splendour of the aquatic life.Women's specific fit for smaller faces.Low-volume mask is easy to equalize.Silicone skirt provides a reliable seal.Lenses are optical quality tempered glass for superior brightness and truer colours.Dry snorkel won't take in water during dives.Purge valve lets you clear any water that gets into snorkel.Soft silicone mouthpiece is smaller for a more comfortable fit.
